data.expected_result: The buttons at the bottom are still visible when your video is off.
data.short_description: The "mute/toggle video/disconnect" buttons at the bottom of video call screen disappears when you turn your video to "off" from "on" at a particular time.
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to voice settings, switch on "push to talk" and keep yourself muted already (which can be done by joining any vc and muting your mic) - Video Call someone (they need not to pickup the call) - Notice your video opens as soon as you video call someone with buttons at the bottom (toggle video, disconnect and mute/unmute) which fade away after like 3 seconds. - Click on video button to close your video and see the buttons reappears. - Now click again and open your video, and click on close video button JUST BEFORE the buttons at the bottom fades away (like at 2.9th second)
